thread.title: Jet Mail’s Fulfillment Business Reaches New Heights With VeraCore!
thread.title_full: Jet Mail’s Fulfillment Business Reaches New Heights With VeraCore!

author: Sean O'Connor
title: Jet Mail’s Fulfillment Business Reaches New Heights With VeraCore!
text:
VeraCore Software Solutions, Inc. and Jet Mail Services, Inc. today announced that they have reached two significant milestones in their strategic partnership; 5 years of collaboration and 25 client storefronts. The firms have released a video heralding the achievements. Jet Mail Services, Inc. of Hudson, MA implemented the VeraCore Fulfillment Solution in 2010 after extensive research into cloud-based order fulfillment and warehouse management software systems. Their objective was to identify a software platform that would enable them to further develop the fulfillment segment of their business. After five consecutive years of growth, it’s clear that that they have succeeded.
VeraCore’s Order Management System enables Jet Mail to provide customizable ordering and reporting portals tailored to meet the unique functional and brand requirement of each of their clients. Ed Kohler, Jet Mail’s President, commented on the success of their fulfillment business, “Fulfillment has really taken off the last few years and VeraCore has played a huge role in the success we have achieved. The depth of the platform gives us enormous confidence when we’re heading into discussions with our clients and prospects.”
VeraCore also provides Jet Mail with a comprehensive Warehouse Management System. VeraCore’s support for barcode technology and rules based processing provides Jet Mail’s fulfillment team with the tools they need to ensure accuracy and efficiency throughout their entire operation.
“Ed has assembled a great team; it’s been a pleasure working with them over the last five years.” exclaimed VeraCore’s President, Denise Lunden. “It’s an exciting success story that we’re happy to play are part in. We’re looking forward to the next five years”!
To learn more, watch the Jet Mail video .
About Jet Mail Services, Inc.
For more than two decades, Jet Mail Services has specialized in marketing production and fulfillment solutions, offering a full range of services in support of smart branding, marketing communications, and customer engagement objectives. Jet Mail brings together the latest in technology with deeply experienced professionals to deliver service that soars.
Visit Jet Mail’s website at http://www.jet-mail.com/
About VeraCore Software Solutions, Inc.
VeraCore Software Solutions, Inc., has been providing software solutions for commercial printers, fulfillment companies, and marketing service providers for over 30 years. Their flagship product, The VeraCore Fulfillment Solution, enables fulfillment service providers to manage all aspects of their clients’ order fulfillment programs.
Visit VeraCore’s website at http://www.veracore.com
